input.sentences: the church where we got married .
the home town church where their parents got married .
beautiful yellow flowers in the sidewalk .
the brick sidewalk in front of the gate .
the gate to the communal garden .
output.sentences: Today we toured our parents town and started at the church.
In this town is were my parents got married.
The church had some yellow flowers on its sidewalk.
We walked through the gate side towards the front and loved the brick sidewalk.
The gate took us to a beautiful garden.
